ContentDesc_Arkadion - Schwergewicht R4: Gabbro's words have sparked your imagination, inspiring you to envision your title match against the Howling Blade in new ways. Had he brought the full might of Fenrir to bear, the lone wolf's formidable strength would have reached greater heights still. How might you have fared if the battle continued to rage on...?
Instancecontenttextdata_40711_Text: Oh dear! The challenger has fallen out of the ring!
Instancecontenttextdata_40721_Text: Oh no, that was too much for the challenger!
Instancecontenttextdata_41901_Text: Can the challenger defeat the wolf in his own lair!?
Instancecontenttextdata_41902_Text: I wonder if you can keep up...
Instancecontenttextdata_41903_Text: Such speed─it's as if there's a pack of him!
Instancecontenttextdata_41912_Text: Selbst Stürme unterwerfen sich Fenrirs Macht!
